title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Skills: Productive Failure-Based Collaborative Problem-Solving Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three alternative approaches by applying productive failure strategies to solve complex social problems.
Learners can identify and address their knowledge gaps at least twice through peer feedback during collaborative problem-solving processes.
Learners can demonstrate the ability to apply core social concepts with an 80% or higher correct response rate in formative assessment tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
